org.rakiura.cpn
Class BasicNet

java.lang.Object
  org.rakiura.cpn.Node
      org.rakiura.cpn.BasicNet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Net, NetElement
public class BasicNet
extends Node
implements Net

Implements a basic Petri Net. This implementation is based on two HashMaps.

BasicNet.java
Created: Tue Sep 26 15:46:46 2000

Since:
3.0

4.1.0 $Revision: 1.45 $

getNetElements

public NetElement[] getNetElements()
Returns all net elements of this net. Note: the subnets are returned as individual subnet objects, so all transitions and places of subnets are not returned by this call.

getAllInputArcs

public InputArc[] getAllInputArcs()
Returns all the input arcs from this net. Note: this method will return all the input arcs, including all the input arcs from this net subnets, and subnet subnets, and so on. To obtain only top level arcs for this net, excluding subnets' input arcs, use getNetElements() instead.

Specified by:
getAllInputArcs in interface Net
Returns:
list with all the input arcs.

getAllOutputArcs

public OutputArc[] getAllOutputArcs()
Returns all the output arcs from this net. Note: this method will return all the output arcs, including all the output arcs from this net subnets, and subnet subnets, and so on. To obtain only top level arcs for this net, excluding subnets' output arcs, use getNetElements() instead.

Specified by:
getAllOutputArcs in interface Net
Returns:
list with all the output arcs.

getAllPlaces

public Place[] getAllPlaces()
Returns all the places from this net. Note: this method will return all the places, including all the places from this net subnets, and subnet subnets, and so on. To obtain only top level places for this net, excluding subnets' places, use getNetElements() instead.

Specified by:
getAllPlaces in interface Net
Returns:
list with all the places.

getAllTransitions

public Transition[] getAllTransitions()
Returns all the transitions from this net. Note: this method will return all transitions, including all transitions from this net subnets, and subnet subnets, and so on. To obtain only top level transitions for this net, excluding subnets' transitions, use getNetElements() instead.

Specified by:
getAllTransitions in interface Net
Returns:
list with all the transitions.

getAllSubnets

public Net[] getAllSubnets()
Returns all the subnets. Note: this method will return all the subnets, including all the subnets from this net subnets, and subnet subnets, and so on. To obtain only top level subnets for this net, excluding subnets' subnets, use getNetElements() instead.

Specified by:
getAllSubnets in interface Net

list with all the subnets.

setMarking

public Marking setMarking(Marking aMarking)
Sets new marking for the entire net. If some places are not referenced in the new marking, the existing marking is left unchanged.

Specified by:
setMarking in interface Net
Parameters:
aMarking - new Marking for the entire net.

Specified by:
resetMarking in interface Net
Returns:
previous marking of the net.

rehash

public void rehash()
Rehash names and IDs of this Petri net elements. This method can be used to dynamically rehash the internal net datastructures to reflect any dynamic name changes. It also re-assigns UIDs to places and transitions.. This method should be used to update the internal net datastructures after changing the name of any, already inserted into Net, net elements.

Specified by:
rehash in interface Net

regenerateIDs

public void regenerateIDs()
Re-generates and re-hashes all the IDs in this net. This method will try to generate new, nice and unique IDs for all the net elements. Use this method with care, as it invalidates all the datastructures which rely on the old IDs of this net (layout, markings, etc).names of all the net elements.

Specified by:
regenerateIDs in interface Net
